title: Patch 6.6 fps drops
body:
Ever since 6.6 hit I went from a normal 60 fps to 2-11 fps during any team fight or skirmish. I usually play on medium settings with no issue. There is a similar complaint on the EUW server but I  couldn't comment there. Both of us have Macs


Edit: apparently it's a sound issue. Try turning off sound in the settings lads

replies.body:
FPS is one of those things that's really difficult to immediately find the root cause.  Could be hardware issues, driver issues, network issues, or corrupt game files.

The first step I would recommend is [making sure you have all updates installed](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974#mq2).  If your system is up-to-date, then go ahead and take a look at the Mac section of our [FPS Troubleshooting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-troubleshooting) article.

Let me know if this helps!

I would like to confirm that this IS a sound issue. Disabling all sound (in the settings) fixes the issue _completely_. This issue was on the PBE as well, but the bug report link was down for pretty much the entire duration, and my forum post was ignored. 

The problem is FPS lag, which increases over time depending on the number of sounds that have gone by, as well as the champions in game. Aurelion sol is particularly heavy on this, as are a few other champions. Disabling sound completely and totally removes any lag at any state. However, reenabling sound returns you to the same state you were at before. 

I've experienced spikes of OVER 30 SECONDS of frame lag from this bug.

This is not: hardware issues
Likely not: Driver issues (if so, you have an easy workaround. Just disable the audio change you did this patch). 
This si not: network issue. Same issue on crappy and speedy network (comcast/university fiber).

The same hardware/driver/network/corrupt game files problem could be the cause for all of our 2010 Mac's? Yesterday all of us were playing normally, and today we can't, I'm not really sure, but there's a possibility that the new scoreboard (Tab) animations and icons are way to heavy or just have bad optimization for our hardware? Making them toggleable may be a solution

- I also have weird audio problems, kinda like with the Bilgewater event (I just remembered that i also experienced massive frame drops there), robotic-like voices (The difference is that during that event, the game used to crash) Remember the red shop? {{item:3151}}

Hi,

I have the same issue and my Mac is a 2013 one. So I do not think it is related to computer's age but rather to the patch (6.6). In my opinion, the issue is not only in team fights. Even during some trades and ganks I saw my FPS drop but it was still playable (30-40). I do not know if you have the same issue too but I noticed that sometimes I lost some frames like a little freeze for less than one second.

Oh and yeah I have also audio issues too. But maybe it is only due to the low FPS issue (if the computer is hard working for the frames maybe he would missed some audio parts). I have already noticed this issue too when I use my headphones. To resolve this, I need to turn off the sound and then re-enable it 10s later.

By the way Apple released 10.11.4 earlier. Maybe they made some changes that do not match with League (I hope it is not that…).

Two patches the same day: OP!

Edit: On Reddit - [topic](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/4booos/massive_frame_drops_during_teamfights_on_66_mac/?sort=new), [answer](https://www.reddit.com/user/panicfancy) -, someone stated that he has the issue with Yosemite so it is not likely due to the update. It seems that turning off the sound works - [see below](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/RoEAt4tQ-patch-66-fps-drops?show=flat&comment=0013) -

According to the update page you guys do not support the latest Mac OS which seems like a typo? El Capitan has been out for a while now. My mac is fully up to date

Thanks for the reply.

We actually do support it!  We support anything over OS X 10.7.5.  Good catch on the page, I've submitted a request to update that section to make it more clear. 

If you're fully up to date and have already gone through the FPS troubleshooting steps, go ahead and [open a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll be able to continue troubleshooting in more depth

First time posting anything on this board.
The problem arose the very first game I started playing after the 6.6 patch.
I own a 2013 Macbook Air 13-inch, and I've never, ever had any FPS issues whatsoever before this patch.
I even had video settings on HIGH for every category except for the shadows (turned off, but that's just my preference).

I tried reinstalling, I tried repairing the client, and I even tried lowering the graphics to very low for every category, yet I still didn't see my usual 70-80 FPS.
Teamfights are impossible. Just flat-out impossible. I've never experienced FPS below 30, but I've been seeing 0~5 FPS throughout the duration of teamfights just after this patch.

Another thing I realized is that the issue is not present in the beginning of the game, but there is an increasing drop in FPS as the game progresses.
Sounds start to crack and lag, which I believe is the core cause of this entire problem.
Disabling sound did remove some decrease in FPS, but the problem seems to persist.

This is DEFINITELY not an issue with our computers, drivers, or any hardware at all.
It is the CLIENT that's clearly dysfunctional.
Please look into this problem, since it's one of the most crucial elements of this game (or any game, really).

Additionally, I am certainly  disappointed that RIOT hasn't taken action for a full two-days-period.
The amount of league players using Apple computers is scathingly high, and the problem has definitely been brought up for you to look into, yet nothing has been done yet.
Please, please address this issue as soon as possible so that we can get back to smooth play.

Hi,

I totally agree with you.

Even if I said earlier that disabling sound helps to recover FPS, after more games I still feel it was not the only issue (screen froze for a very short period of time, or FPS drop - but still playable - ). However turning off sound permits playing the game with correct FPS (if you are not too much bothered by the lack of sound).

Off topic: Playing without sound is a good training for your map awareness ^^ (future funny pre-game tip?)

Thanks for all the comments guys!  Submitted this forward for our QA guys to look into.

In the meantime, many people are reporting that turning off sounds seems to work for them.  If anyone's experiencing FPS issues outside of this, feel free to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our Tech specialists will be happy to take a look.

Hi,

First of all, thanks for your quick answers.

Why is there still no message displayed on the client to suggest Mac players to turn off the sound due to a huge drop of FPS? I think that many Mac players will not go on the NA boards (I am from EUW - yeah I know it is already displayed next to my name - ) and they may not find the solution.
lol @ playing without sound.  The game is literally unplayably without hearing what's happening.  Please get this fixed!

I have been having similar problems since the 6.6 release. I average about 35-40 fps in laning phase until there is a team fight then I drop to about 6 fps and get stuttered captions of the fight. It makes it near impossible to play. (also on Mac)
Same problem. There's a trend here riot. Every Mac user is having problems. It's definitely the patch not our hardware.
Same problem with me, during team fights I only get 5 or so fps and can't do anything. I also have a MacBook Pro, and this hasn't ever happened before this patch.
Its just impossible to play without any sound. Please fix. It has been a month now
6.7 still no fix :/
Thanks riot, without your lack of communication about fixing this problem, I would have never played DOTA. Feels good to play a game with sound
Riot gives us an update or somethings its been like 11 days, I miss playing

8 days and no fix, pathetic. 

Also it appears to be only when playing certain champs, when I played High Noon Jhin the FPS go to hell but when I played Dragonslayer Vayne I had no issues. 

Using a Macbook Pro:
Early 2011
4 Gb Ram 1333 Mhz
Dual core i7 2.7 Ghz
Intel Graphics HD 3000, 384 Mb 
750 HDD 
Running the latest version of El Capitan

Riot, how about actually doing something instead of suggesting dumb "solutions" like turning off the sound or checking the "FPS troubleshooting guide"?
Same problem here, Mavericks OS (older mac, don't want to upgrade). Sound gets overloaded and game becomes unplayable

This is not an Issue with Just older Macs, I got mine last year (2015) and the FPS drops and sound distortion during team fights is horrendous, I actually thought it was just me and my mac and that i must of damaged it. But Im glad everyone seems to be having the issue as well. How will this go about being fixed? @RiotBox?

Same here, i'm from LAN, this is my NA Account, i've experienced horrible frame drops in teamfights (5-10) and yesterday i was playing at 60 fps, May it be the new scoreboard animations? they're definitively unnecessary... At least make them toggleable please

-MacBook Air Late 2010, Up to date (El Capitan)

Dear same-sies: disabling all audio fixed the problem for me. I have no sound now, but at least I have no heart-breaking fps pitfalls. Try it out. Ingame-> press ESC, go to audio, and on the bottom of the menu is a box for "disable all sound"- and click that. Good luck.

same problem on a 2012 Macbook pro retina. 
every graphic setting on low. 
since 6.6 massive audio + video stutters during teamfights and consorts.
same problem but on windows 7

Same. From 60 to 30 FPS after this patch. On very low settings same thing.
Lenovo Flex 2 15 notebook. NVIDIA Geforce 840M.

EDIT: Works well for now, but gets bad when I turn on vsync.

Same here, all fine before patch 6.6 (25-70fps). On 6.6 6-40fps. Impossible to play teamfights. 
System: MacbookPro Mid 2010; OSX 10.11.3; 2,4GHz Intel Core 2 Duo; 8GB 1067MHz DDR3; NVIDIA GeForce 320M 256MB; 250SSD
Same. Patch 6.5- 30-70 fps. Patch 6.6- 2-30 fps. Just leveling gives my computer a heart attack.
Same with me, i went from about 120 fps to 30 after the new patch.
I have a PC and i have the same problem. Riot needs to fix it soon because i really enjoy the meta this season and i want to climb the ladder but it's nearly impossible with 10 fps.

Sound isn't the issue for me and I don't know what is. It's the most annoying thing I've encountered and it disrupts my performance all game. I've turned off V-sync. Disabled all sounds. Turned off anti-aliasing. Put the game in borderless. But nothing helps. This is very annoying
anyone got an fix sound isint an issue for me! pls help! sent 2 tickets but they just said that they cant help me!
has there been any fix to this riot? I used to play at a flat 60 fps now im paying at a flat 30 worse in team fights

I am getting fps drop and before it was 60fps flat until I update patch 6.15. I play on a mac book air 11inches, the game work fine but when I log in the loading screen of the log in screen it frost and every time I restart the league of legend game play the fps is 60flat and after 5 minutes it start to drop again do anyone know how to fix this problem.

Hello guys,
I have got a problem
I play between 60-80 fps while farming. When it comes to fights like trading or drake fights etc. my fps drop down to 4-7 so my screen freezes comepletely.
I play with middle graphic options and sound is turned off completely.
I dont know what i can do to fix it.
Need your help

Hey, I'm using a Macbook Pro End2013 and I have (still) the same problems. Lowering the settings or turn off the sound doesn't help. I ended a ticket and got the answer to turn off "anti aliasing" but also this doesn't fix my FPS problem. Normally I play with 60 - 80 FPS now I play with 30 FPS (in team fights 10 FPS). So how can I fix this problem? Or do we still need to wait for new patches? I can't play this game anymore since ≈ 1 month. Thank you for answers.

Same on PC for me. Went from constant 100-120 fps to now 30-40 and disabling sound brings it up to about 70 but it's pretty stupid to have to play without sound when they could just fix it. Or at least work on it. It's been over a month and I did every single thing that is listed on the support page to fix fps but none of it worked. Also disabling the sound makes the max I get 70 but it fluctuates between 40 and 70 the entire match.
common rito wtf
Same on my PC.After 6.6 from 150 fps to 2-10,and turning off sound isn't fix.
Same exact problem, Mavericks OS as well
Same problem for me as well.  Thought this was related to my upgrade to el cap yesterday, but looks like more likely related to 6.6.
Still having the sound fps lag during team fights, sound gets all robotic and fps drop to 3-7. Been playing without sound like a month now....... So lame
PleasE.. ?  I need all trynda skin, thanks by advance {{item:3187}} {{item:3070}}
Hello. I have a very big problem. After 6.6 patch i cant focus on the game anymore.. during the game the graphics lags and sometimes sound is bad. i need someone to help me

I've got a Macbook air 13" Early 2014, and before this patch, I had like 50-80fps.. but now, I go from 50 to 20 from nowhere, especially at tfs. I hope Riot update this issue soon, because we're their customers and we spend money on this game.

Turning off sounds worked for me but I can't play with out sounds so I'm going to give the repair feature a shot I'll keep you all updated to let you guys know if it worked or not,  in theory it should work because if it is a corrupted file (it must be since not every single person is effected) the repair should find the corrupted file and "repair" it. I'll keep you all updated after I try it and play a few games

Yeah repair function doesnt fix the issue, as well as fps drops i have spikes in ping. Its anywhere from 35(my normal) to 150 and never at the same spot always changing. Please riot I really would like to enjoy this game again

Repairing the client would not work because I think someone has already tested this (and I hope Riot too).

The client repairs files that are corrupted according to **itself**. if it does not see corrupted files, he will not do anything (Captain Obvious is proud). Even if it detects corrupted files, Riot has still not released a solution. So the client will not find clean files on Riot's servers and will re-download 6.6 files.
